trans-unit.source: Supports a trigger action that resumes a paused <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy eseményindító művelet, amely újraindítja a szüneteltetett támogatja <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this class with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to resume a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály használata <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>vagy egy <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>felfüggesztett <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> folytatása</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: A ResumeStoryboard object can only resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that is paused and has no effect on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in any other state.
trans-unit.target: Egy ResumeStoryboard objektum csak folytathatja a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, amely fel van függesztve, és nincs hatása a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>más állapotban.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, ResumeStoryboard, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nem fogja tudni szüneteltetése, folytatásához, vagy más módon szabályozhatja a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>interaktív módon, állítsa be a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, és egy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objektum (például <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, ResumeStoryboard, vagy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) átvehetik a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> Vezérlőpultjának</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively controlled after it starts.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>nincs megadva, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>nem interaktív módon vezérelhető Miután elindult.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: [hogyan: használja az eseményindítók szabályozására, a Storyboard után kezdődik](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard"> </xref> osztály.
